title: "Entrepreneurs can now open an account with Birbank Biznes using facial recognition"
excerpt: "Birbank Biznes, the internet and mobile banking system designed for legal entities and individual entrepreneurs, has streamlined its registration process significantly. For the first time in Azerbaijan, entrepreneurs can now take advantage of the innovative “Registration through Facial Recognition” feature to effortlessly open a business account."
